main event: A bright disc-shaped object with smaller objects attached hovered and then shot out of sight near Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, around May 15, 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright disc with several smaller objects,The sighting included an unusual flashing and intermittent glow,The object was observed moving rapidly and erratically,An amateur astronomer reported the sighting from his home in Northeast Philadelphia,The sighting coincided with reported flares dropped from a U.S. Navy aircraft in the area.
sighted object: bright disc-shaped object with smaller objects
witness description: Civilian, works for an electronics firm, and is an amateur astronomer.
